abstract: Microsoft buys TV advertising specialist Navic Networks to boost its digital advertising offerings.
snippet: Microsoft buys TV advertising specialist Navic Networks to boost its digital advertising offerings.
lead_paragraph: In the latest in a string of acquisitions aimed at expanding its digital advertising services, Microsoft said that it was buying Navic Networks, a maker of television advertising technology.

headline.main: Microsoft Buys TV Ad Technology Company

abstract: Microsoft said on Wednesday it had purchased privately held digital television advertising technology company Navic Networks. Terms of the deal were not disclosed.
lead_paragraph: Microsoft said on Wednesday it had purchased privately held digital television advertising technology company Navic Networks. Terms of the deal were not disclosed.

headline.main: Microsoft Picks Up Ad Tech Firm

abstract: Yahoo investors are showing more interest in an alternate board slate proposed by billionaire Carl C. Icahn that was first formed to deliver the company to Microsoft in a now-defunct buyout.
lead_paragraph: Yahoo investors are showing more interest in an alternate board slate proposed by billionaire Carl C. Icahn that was first formed to deliver the company to Microsoft in a now-defunct buyout.

headline.main: Some Support Remains for Icahn’s Yahoo Slate

abstract: Microsoft Corp. said Wednesday it has acquired Navic Networks, which specializes in emerging forms of television advertising technology.
snippet: Microsoft Corp. said Wednesday it has acquired Navic Networks, which specializes in emerging forms of television advertising technology.
lead_paragraph: “Microsoft Corporation said Wednesday that it had acquired Navic Networks, which specializes in emerging forms of television advertising technology,” the Associated Press reports.

headline.main: Microsoft’s Entrance Into The Targeted TV Advertising Arena
